MS MCQs

    Consume REST web services in Xamarin apps - Use platform-specific network features

    »

    1. Which of the following choices is the best reason to use the native networking stacks with HttpClient?

      The native networking stack provides you with native features that are more optimized for the platform.

      If you don’t use the native networking stack, Apple rejects the application during the review process.

      You use the native networking stack to run code when your application is in the background.


    2. Which of the following options is not a valid way to opt out of App Transport Security?

      Use the NSExceptionDomains key in the info.plist file.

      In the project settings, enable the (Ignore App Transport Security) option.

      Use the NSAllowsArbitraryLoads key in the info.plist file.
